title: Roast sprouts with walnuts and pomegranates
time: Hands-on time 10 min, oven time 15 min
description: Super simple, quick-to-make yet full of flavour – what’s not to like? Try this roast Brussels sprouts recipe with walnuts and pomegranates for a side dish with a difference.
ingredients: a handful of fresh sage leaves

method.Step 1: Heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan/gas 6. Toss 800g trimmed and halved brussels sprouts with a glug of veg oil on a roasting tray, then roast for 10 minutes.

method.Step 2: Add 50g walnut halves and a handful of fresh sage leaves, toss to coat, then return to the oven for 5 minutes.

method.Step 3: Drizzle 2-3 tbsp pomegranate molasses over, shake the tin to coat everything, then tip onto a warmed serving plate or bowl and scatter over a handful of pomegranate seeds.
